author: ramkrishna
msg: HBASE-5722 NPE in ZKUtil#getChildDataAndWatchForNewChildren when ZK not available or NW down. (Uma)

author: ramkrishna
msg: HBASE-6122 Backup master does not become Active master after ZK exception (Ram)

author: psharples
msg: Updates to the page sharing facility.  A user can share pages which by default are non-editable, but can also elect to give users 'editing' permissions - add, move, delete widgets etc on the page.  See RAVE-103. Also fixed the mobile view which had a bug (referred to old renderSequence in <PAGE>)
